pages.text: There are a couple of new enchantments available with enhance and augment the new items to be even better and more powerful. All enchantments available can be gotten at a regular Enchantment Table, and support up to $(d)Enchantment Level X.

pages.title: Overclock
pages.text: The $(5)Overclock$() enchantment can be applied to any items which have an internal charge, like Mystium or Novasteel Tools, or the AEFG. This raises the internal battery capacity by 20% for each level of the enchantment.

pages.title: Engineer's Fury
pages.text: The $(4)Engineer's Fury$() enchantment can be applied to the Wrench-O-Matic only, and increases the amount of knockback done while the wrench is in $(4)Wrath Mode.$()
